faqs.question: How long do consulting engagements typically last?
faqs.answer: Engagement duration varies based on project scope and complexity. Most transformation programs range from 6-18 months, while consultation packages can be month-to-month.

faqs.question: Do you offer payment plans or financing options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment terms and can work with financing partners for larger transformation programs. Contact us to discuss payment options.

faqs.question: What is included in the monthly consultation package?
faqs.answer: The consultation package includes monthly strategy sessions, implementation support, progress reporting, and email support to ensure continuous guidance and success.

faqs.question: Can we switch between pricing plans?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We understand business needs evolve, and we offer flexible options to upgrade or downgrade your plan as your requirements change.
